abstract: Tensions between the management of Motorola, the cell phone maker, and the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn heated up after Motorola reported a loss for the first quarter and issued a disappointing forecast for the second, leading some analysts to question whether it would be able to return to profitability this year.
lead_paragraph: Tensions between the management of Motorola, the cell phone maker, and the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn heated up after Motorola reported a loss for the first quarter and issued a disappointing forecast for the second, leading some analysts to question whether it would be able to return to profitability this year.

headline.main: Motorola and Icahn Raise Voices in Proxy Fight
